sdk_documentation: Meklē dokumentāciju? Paskaties šeit Caffeinated SDK Wiki.
page.signin.disclaimer: Ienākot, Tu piekrīti mūsu %terms_of_service% un %privacy_policy%. Spied %here%, ja tiešām vēlies lasīt.
page.signin.kick.looking_for_oauth: Vēlies ienākt ar Google vai Apple?
page.signin.kick.looking_for_oauth.modal: Diemžēl mēs nevaram pieņemt ienākšanu Kick ar Google vai Apple kontiem, un Jums būs jālieto lietotājvārds un parole. Ja Jums vēl nav parole, tad jūs to varat izveidot izrakstoties no Kick, noklikšķinot uz "Log In", pēc tam uz "Forgot Password?" un ievadot savu GMail vai iCloud e-pasta adresi. Noklikšķinot uz "Reset Password", Jūs saņemsiet e-pastu, kas ļaus Jums izveidot paroli savam kontam. Kad tas būs izdarīts, Jūs varat ienākt Casterlabs izmantojot šo jauno paroli. Joprojām varat pierakstīties Kick izmantojot Google/Apple kontus.
page.signin.kick.keeps_saying_incorrect: Joprojām saņem "Username or password is incorrect"?
If you keep getting "Username or password is incorrect" even though you know that it is correct, then you do not have a mobile login yet. To create one, simply reset your password and reuse your current password. This fixes the login issue with both Casterlabs and the official Kick mobile app.
page.widgets.info: Pievieno šos pie OBS kā "Browser sources".

page.chat_bot.commands.examples.shoutout: Lets you shoutout another streamer. Usage: !shoutout <username>
page.chat_bot.commands.examples.song.des: Displays the current song you're listening to and provides a link. Usage: !song
page.chat_bot.commands.examples.where.de: Lists which platforms you are live on and provides links to your other accounts. Usage: !where
page.chat_bot.timers.format: Every %seconds% seconds, send one of the following:
page.chat_bot.settings.hide_commands_fro: Makes Caffeinated hide all !commands and responses from the chat widget.
page.chat_bot.settings.hide_timers_from_: Makes Caffeinated hide all timer messages from the chat widget.
page.chat_bot.settings.hide_from_chatbot:
Hide some additional accounts from your chat widget, such as 
@Nightbot
or 
@Botrix
.
page.settings.appearance.zoom.descriptio: Makes Caffeinated's UI larger or smaller. Use with caution.
page.settings.appearance.close_to_tray.d: Makes Caffeinated cozy up in the background when you close it.
